text.0: let songs of ours speed agni forth like a fleet courser in the race.
text.1: and we will win each prize through him.
text.2: agni the dart whereby we gain kine for ourselves with help from thee.
text.3: that send us for the gain of wealth.
text.4: o agni bring us wealth secure vast wealth in horses and in kine.
text.5: oil thou the socket turn the wheel.
text.6: o agni thou hast made the sun eternal star to mount the sky.
text.8: thou agni art the peoples light best dearest seated in thy shrine.
text.9: watch for the singer give him life.
